MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:15am to safely complete repair works on our overhead line network near Shortrigg and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:34am on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
